data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample use, sample source, and source sample ID of participants with or without tobacco use disorder and involved in the "CIDR, NCI, NIDA Sequencing of Targeted Genomic Regions Associated with Smoking" project.

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample Use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_Target: Custom targeted DNA sequencing
